CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Address_1__c), "", Address_1__c & " | " ) & IF(ISBLANK(Address_2__c), "", Address_2__c & " | " ) & IF(ISBLANK(City__c), "", City__c & " | " ) & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(State__c)), "", TEXT(State__c) & " | " ) & IF(ISBLANK(Zip__c), "", Zip__c & " | " )
CustomField.label: Full Address
